metadata.title: CVE-2024-51490 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Ampache is a web based audio/video streaming application and file manager.This vulnerability exists in the interface section of the Ampache menu,where users can change "Custom URL - Logo". This section is not properlysanitized, allowing for the input of strings that can execute JavaScript.This issue has been addressed in version 7.0.1 and all users are advised toupgrade. There are no known workarounds for this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: ampache package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
